alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 3:58AM MDT until April 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Tuesday. There will likely be a lull in the steady snowfall between midnight and 6 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult including over South Pass. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility around a tenth of a mile in heaver snow could result in snowmobilers becoming disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
